verbose_text: Moreover, in the model of alphaGalCer induced immune mediated hepatitis, in which liver injury is independent of hepatic macrophages / monocytes, mirtazapine treatment did not alter hepatitis severity as reflected by ALT levels (ALT in U/L; vehicle : 19.0 +/- 1.1 vs. alphaGalCer + vehicle : * 251.4 +/- 29.8 vs. alphaGalCer + mirtazapine : * 271.0 +/- 61.7; * p < 0.01 vs. vehicle alone group; n = 5 mice per group).
